Title: All The Interim Is Like A Phantasma
Plot: Michael returns to Kath but she and Colin begin to worry as the FBI fuels Michael's suspicions about their relationship. Eileen is confined to bed rest for the duration of her pregnancy. Tommy seeks Michael's assistance as Declan begins to zero his investigation in on the Waterfront Project.
ParentalRatingReason: Sadistic violence, drug use, offensive language & sex scenes
